name: SnowPlowBan
description:
Small puzzle game made for Puzzle Jam II

Made with Godot engine, Puzzlescript and Psionic Godot module
The game might take a few seconds to load, sorry about that

Controls
Move:  WASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys
Rotate camera: Click and drag the mouse
Zoom: Mouse wheel
Undo: E
Reset: R

Goals
Reach the flags.
Sometimes you'll have to clear the snow from designated spots before reaching the flag. Take care not to put snow on the houses or you won't be able to complete the level.

Credits
jibbs : game and level design, additional programmingKerDelos : 3d models, music and programming
